CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Potencial'),'Potenciales', IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Vencido'),'Vencidas', IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'En gesti√≥n/insistir'),'Planificadas', IF( ISPICKVAL(StageName,'No apto') || ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Con venta') || ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Cerrado positivo') || ISPICKVAL(StageName,'No interesado') ,'Gestionadas',''))))
CustomField.label: Etapa Analytics
